EmailTemplate.name: May 2016.Flight Preview
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell GoDirect Flight Preview App Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> NEWS | Business Aviation APP GIVES PILOTS PREVIEWS OF COMING APPROACHES
A new app from Honeywell eliminates surprises by giving pilots a highly accurate preview of the runway and surrounding terrain â€“ long before they begin their approach. Introduced in spring 2016, the Flight Preview app provides a useful, practical and intuitive iPad tool that lets pilots know what they can expect during one of the most critical phases of flight. LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/Mandates]]>
